title: Bella Vista - Spacious Renovated 1 Bedroom
description:
This impeccable renovation has left no detail unattended. Located across the street from a park, this light filled second floor apartment is also just ONE block from Whole Foods! Enter into this charming brick front corner property to find your entire second floor apartment that has been renovated top to bottom.
All Brazilian cherry hardwood floors, central air and Nest thermostat, custom lighting with dimmers throughout, USB ports on all outlets for convenience. Beautiful kitchen maximizes the space with all stainless steel appliances including Bosch three rack dishwasher, built in microwave, 5 burner range with convection oven, extra deep stainless steel sink, and stunning granite counter tops including breakfast bar.
All in one combo washer/dryer in unit, and FREE shared laundry in the building basement as well as separate dedicated additional storage space just for this unit. Stunning marble tile bath with glass doors, shower with temperature and volume control, bathroom fan with built in humidity sensor, and bidet toilet seat.
Beautiful wood blinds on the windows. An absolutely perfectly thought out rental. Walk to Whole Foods, Acme, Starbucks, Angelo's pizzeria, and more from this fantastic location. Truly a must see. Available for July 1st move in. No Pets, no smoking.

title: Cute 2 Bedroom with Patio in Fishtown
description:
Cute townhouse for rent in Fishtown! This nicely designed townhouse is move-in ready NOW! The welcoming living space is separated into two sections by the staircase. Each area is great in size; perfect for a sectional couch on one end and a formal dining table on the other!
The galley style kitchen offers tenants great cabinet and prep space along with a large window with a view of the patio. The kitchen leads directly to the back patio perfect size for morning coffee drinking or grilling.

Did we mention location? Endless opportunities for brunch, happy hour, formal dining, day drinking, and more! Breweries, 5-star restaurants, local markets and convenient transportation is on every block.

title: Lovely rental listing in the Rittenhouse Square neighborhood!
description: Lovely rental listing in the Rittenhouse Square neighborhood. At the entrance you are greeted by a fabulous grand staircase leading up to the unit. This spacious home boasts a large living room with high ceilings and a gas fireplace that is perfect for entertaining. The beautiful hardwood floors run throughout the entire unit. The kitchen is modern and equipped with a dishwasher, 5 burner gas range, granite countertops, ample cabinet space, pantry storage, and a wine refrigerator. There are two spacious bedrooms with an abundance of closet space and a roof deck with absolutely gorgeous city views. This unbeatable location is conveniently located within a stone's throw of some of the most popular spots in the city and close proximity to area hospitals, universities, and theaters. Washer/dryer in the unit. A pet will be considered on a case by case basis. 24+ month lease required.
